channel.title: [PI] Challenge Attack
channel.description: When I try to challenge someone in the Duel Arena, instead of sending a duel request, it is trying to attack the other player saying: "Your opponent is not in the wilderness.". Help?

item.title: [PI] Challenge Attack
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

When I try to challenge someone in the Duel Arena, instead of sending a duel request, it is trying to attack the other player saying: “Your opponent is not in the wilderness.”.
Help?

Read full topic
